Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Can ask multiple follow up questions to get the exact answer I need with AI. Sometimes teachers won’t understand what I’m asking or give an unhelpful answer.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: No anxiety asking GenAI. Can be anxiety inducing to ask teacher.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI is more descriptive on writing/essay feedback. Many teachers will just write a simple comment like change this but not explain why or how.
